snippet.title: Houston, we do not have a problem: Phil Mickelson boosts Masters hopes
snippet.description:
* His old rival Tiger Woods is missing the Masters, but three-time champion Phil Mickelson should be teeing off at Augusta next week after allaying fears about his fitness.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/04/sport/golf/phil-mickelson-masters-golf/index.html

snippet.title: New research supports light therapy to warm up winter blues
snippet.description:
* NEW YORK CNN The holiday season is supposed to be full of cheer. But for many, the winter season brings on the blues. Doctors say light treatment may offer a cure naturally.
http://www.cnn.com/HEALTH/AccentHealth/9812/winter.depression/index.html

snippet.title: Summer sun for winter blues
snippet.description:
* WebMD Spending time basking in the sun may be more important than you think. Sure, its a sensual pleasure and brightens your day. But far beyond that, thesummer sun may help you avoid winter depression.
http://www.cnn.com/HEALTH/alternative/9907/12/sun.depression/index.html

snippet.title: Seasonal blues? Lack of blue light may be to blame
snippet.description:
* As winter approaches and the days get shorter, your mood may get darker too. Sunlight deprivation can make people feel lethargic, gloomy, and irritable, and for some it can lead to the condition known as seasonal affective disorder, or winter depression.
http://www.cnn.com/2010/HEALTH/10/27/health.blue.light.moods/index.html
